programme.desc: The DEA pits a Los Angeles martial artist (Sasha Mitchell) against a drug lord holding his wife prisoner in Mexico.

programme.desc: A debt-ridden gambler (George Eads) gets in over his head when a mysterious high-roller (Stephen Lang) hires him for a job that has an unexpected condition attached.

programme.desc: Reno, Bobby and Cheyenne get taken by a fellow bounty hunter, then join forces with her to bring down a gang of armed robbers.

programme.desc: Bank robbers Seth and Richie Gecko head for the Mexican border, encountering a deadly standoff at a liquor store along the way; Richie is haunted by visions of demons and a mysterious woman.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn
programme.desc: The Gecko brothers flee the liquor store with Ranger Freddie Gonzalez in pursuit; Richie's visions escalate; the Geckos nearly collide with the Fullers, a troubled family making its own desperate journey to Mexico.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn
programme.desc: Richie struggles with his visions; Seth makes a plan with Carlos to cross the border; the Fullers suffer an RV breakdown; Ranger Gonzalez seeks help from an expert.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn
programme.desc: Seth and Richie take the Fuller family hostage and attempt to leave the motel undetected, but Freddie -- led by the same force that has been guiding Richie -- arrives at their door, igniting a clash that nearly destroys them all.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn
programme.desc: After a daring escape from the motel, Seth leads the Fullers' RV to the border crossing; an irrational fear takes hold of Richie; Jacob Fuller takes control of a volatile situation, determined to get his children safely across the border.

programme.title: The Cabin in the Woods
programme.desc: Two unseen scientists manipulate the gory goings-on at a backwoods cabin inhabited by a group of unsuspecting college friends (Kristen Connolly, Chris Hemsworth, Anna Hutchison).
